item.description:
PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE, TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP

 

It's time for another Mix +Mingle cross Meetup Party for 200 members at Cavern Club inside the Hard Rock Cafe (near Faneuil Hall) at 22 - 24 Clinton Street Boston, MA, Telephone (617) 424-7625

Website http://www.hardrock.com/locations/cafes3/cafe.aspx?LocationID=101&MIBenumID=3

 

Inside the Cavern Club (it's on the right after you walk into the Hard Rock Café) we will get the following:

  1. From 6:30PM to 7:30PM (One free hour) of appetizers (chicken tupelo, spring rolls, haystack salads, pulled pork sandwich).  A good reason to get there early and enjoy some FREE FOOD WHILE IT LASTS. -----------There will be a sign at the FOOD saying reserved for Social Fun.
  2. Free pool for three hours (Yes, it’s free we will have 2 out of 3 pool tables reserved just for us)
  3. Reserved seating and live music (Yes, it’s free too)
  4. Free cover to REWIRED (DJ dance night) from 10pm – 2am, Yes this is when the wild, fun and crazy dancing starts. Note they will start clearing out the table and chairs around 9PM to make room for the dancing!
  5. They will have $3 Sam Adams Seasonal Bottled Beer

At 10PM the DJ starts up. Please do not complain if it gets too loud or crazy, since members come to dance to music at 10PM. What happens at the Mix N Mingles stays at the Mix N Mingles OK? Lol

 

If anyone wants to contribute a buck ($1) to your Social Fun Organizer for setting this up this event that be cool. Please join us for all this fun on Friday, starting at 6:30PM till the cows come home.

 

The 6 Meetup Groups that are invited to come:

  1. Social Fun Meetup http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/
  2. World is Our Playground http://www.meetup.com/The-World-is-Our-Playground/
  3. The Boston Volunteer Meetup http://www.bostonvolunteer.org/
  4. Boston Happy Hour Meetup http://www.meetup.com/nightlife-421/
  5. Girls just want to have FUN Meetup http://www.meetup.com... 
  6. The Boston Euro Social Meetup http://www.meetup.com/euro-76/ 

Each invited group only gets 40 spots for members to RSVP!

 

We normally have over 150 members at these Mix and Mingle parties. This will be the first time we do this herer and its free so we had to give up a few things  so I hope it will be ok?

I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party. It should be fun!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Mix and Mingle Joint Event at the Hard Rock Cafe
